body: HEy all, today I tried to join Avicus. But I couldn't join. Lobbies down? Or how to join a server like Throwback, DTM01 ? Please write asap!
body_tagged: HEy all, today I tried to join Avicus. But I couldn't join. Lobbies down? Or how to join a server like Throwback, DTM01 ? Please write asap!
title: CANNOT join to Avicus

replies.body: Server DTM01 is only accessible if you are using 1.8. From the looks of it, avicus is currently down.
replies.body_tagged: Server DTM01 is only accessible if you are using 1.8. From the looks of it, avicus is currently down.

replies.body: I'm on 1.8 but I can't connect to hubD:
replies.body_tagged: I'm on 1.8 but I can't connect to hubD:

replies.body: There was a link or something like that to join directly to Throwback, SG01 or DTM02. What was that?
replies.body_tagged: There was a link or something like that to join directly to Throwback, SG01 or DTM02. What was that?

replies.body: Avicus is currently down, from the looks of it.
replies.body_tagged: Avicus is currently down, from the looks of it.

replies.body:
Yes,
We are currently having some issues with the server. The admins have been alerted and I'm sure the server will be up very soon.
